message: This is my first offer.  Let's be fair and split the money with me getting the majority.  I'm hoping we can agree quickly.
Alice, your offer was quite greedy.  Let's be more realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  Take this offer, before inflation eats away at your potential gains!
I'm willing to compromise, but I won't accept a 70/30 split.  Let's meet in the middle at 60/40.  If we don't come to an agreement, we'll both end up with less money due to inflation.
